response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $15,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a reduced cost.
